org.cpsolver.ifs.model

Class GlobalConstraint<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.model.Constraint<V,T>
      • org.cpsolver.ifs.model.GlobalConstraint<V,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Constraint<V,T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CancelledSections, ConfigLimit, CourseLimit, DisabledSections, ExtendedStudentConflicts, FixedAssignments, FixInitialAssignments, GroupConstraint, HardDistanceConflicts, InstructorConstraint, MaxOverExpectedConstraint, NoStudentOnlineConflicts, RequiredReservation, RequiredRestrictions, RequiredSections, ReservationLimit, SectionLimit, StudentNotAvailable

    public abstract class GlobalConstraint<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
extends Constraint<V,T>
    Generic global constraint.

    Global constraint is a Constraint that applies to all variables.
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)
    Copyright (C) 2006 - 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller
    See Also:
    Variable, Model, Constraint, Solver

      • assigned

        public void assigned(Assignment<V,T> assignment,
                     long iteration,
                     T value)
        Given value is to be assigned to its variable. In this method, the constraint should unassigns all variables which are in conflict with the given assignment because of this constraint.
        Overrides:
        assigned in class Constraint<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        iteration - current iteration
        value - assigned value
